titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4613) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-559, by Mrs. Myrick.

The amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole. Upon the adoption of this resolution it shall be in order, any rule of the House to the contrary notwithstanding, to consider concurrent resolutions providing for adjournment of the House and Senate during the month of July.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 192.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 683.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 196 (Roll no. 279).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 197 (Roll no. 280).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/22/2004--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4613) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005.
